source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick by 3% stacking up to 10 times. Rising Sun Kick and Spinning Crane Kick have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Fists of Fury applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! when cast and when finished channeling completely. The damage of your next Fists of Fury is increased by 8% per stack when  Winning Streak! is removed.

Your  Winning Streak! is always removed once it reaches max stacks.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Lord Godfrey's Old Spectacles

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 194,284 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spells.description: Equip: Proclaim your fashion sense to the world.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Look through the lens and randomly scale up or down, gaining 10,907 Critical Strike or Haste for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 5,111 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 750 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
